Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not before); ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Technique: WOVEN; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Linen fragment
Description: A length of finely woven linen, probably a mummy bandage. There is a hieroglyphic inscription of black ink.Ends per inch (warp threads): 15.Picks per inch (weft threads): 11.
